title: BEST Model-Based Research Methodology Education: TPACK-Integrated Short-Term Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic social science theories and research design concepts
context.additional_context: Research methodology education in a blended digital environment, emphasizing collaborative and feedback-driven activities among learners

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform the research design process from topic selection to data analysis.
Learners can effectively present research findings using digital tools (survey analysis software, visualization tools, etc.).
Learners can critically evaluate and improve research methodologies based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
